candidate.name: haddoudi
candidate.summary: A passionate software engineer with over 5 years of experience in developing scalable web applications. Skilled in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Led a team of 5 engineers in developing a real-time analytics platform using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Achieved a 30% increase in performance and a 20% reduction in downtime.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed and maintained a web application for managing customer relationships, improving the efficiency of sales processes by 25%.

hobbies.description: Enjoys cycling in Central Park during weekends.
Keeps up-to-date with the latest technology trends through reading books and articles.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.title: Real-Time Analytics Platform
projects.description: A web-based platform for real-time data analysis, built using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. The platform allows users to visualize and analyze large datasets in real-time.

projects.title: Customer Relationship Management System
projects.description: A web application for managing customer relationships, featuring a user-friendly interface and advanced analytics capabilities.
